source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_000<tab>Thinking of trying your hand at a little dragonslaying, are you? Well, be my guest─so long as you know what you're up against. Those scaly bastards are smarter than you think, and crafty with it.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_000ドラゴン族と戦おうというのなら、決して油断しないことね。
奴らは本当に頭が良くて、狡猾なんだから。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_001<tab>Hail, <var 08 E905 ((sister)) ((brother)) /var>! If you're thinking of heading out hunting in the Churning Mists, I've got some information that you might find to your advantage.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_001あら、もしかして……噂に聞く「ドラヴァニア雲海」まで、
ドラゴン族を狩りに行くつもりなの？
だったらいい情報があるわよ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_Q1_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_001<tab>Tell me about the rank B elite mark. (Scitalis)
target: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_001<tab>ランクB：優雅なる老竜「スキタリス」について

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_002<tab>Tell me about the rank B elite mark. (The Scarecrow)
target: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_002<tab>ランクB：暴虐の策略家「スケアクロウ」について

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_003<tab>Tell me about the rank A elite mark. (Bune)
target: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_003<tab>ランクA：異端の逃亡者「ブネ」について

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_004<tab>Tell me about the rank A elite mark. (Agathos)
target: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_004<tab>ランクA：黒翼の魔竜「アガトス」について

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_005<tab>Tell me about the rank S elite mark. (Gandarewa)
target: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_005<tab>ランクS：邪教の教祖「ガンダルヴァ」について

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_006<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_A1_000_006<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_010<tab>As wyverns grow, they progress through a number of developmental stages, their bodies becoming more and more streamlined with each change. In their final forms, even their horns drop off, leaving them with a sleek shape perfectly suited for flight.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_010飛竜ワイバーンは齢を重ね進化を続けると、
どんどん、飛行に適した滑らかな形態になっていくわ。
最終的には、角なんかもなくなっちゃうのよ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_011<tab>It is one such elder wyvern that has been marked for death by a certain nobleman. It seems the beast has taken something of a fancy to the fellow's son─a pretty young thing I wouldn't mind gobbling up myself. Mayhap not in the same manner as the wyvern, though...
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_011そんなエルダー・ワイバーンに、さる貴族からの依頼で、
リスキーモブに指定されたヤツがいるわ。
なんでも、ご子息の仇なんだとか……。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_012<tab>You should be able to spot this monster easily enough─its sleek, shining scales have earned it the name “Scitalis,” after a legendary dragon with similarly lustrous skin.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_012滑らかで優雅な鱗を持つことから、
「スキタリス」という渾名がつけられているヤツよ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_020<tab>Not long ago, a party of Temple Knights headed into the foothills of Sohm Al to spy on the dragons' activities. However, a few days into their mission, they disappeared without a trace. A rescue party was dispatched to find the missing knights, and find them it did.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_020霊峰ソーム・アルの様子を覗うため、
麓に向かった神殿騎士団の偵察隊が、行方不明になったの。
数日後、追加派遣された捜索隊は見つけたわ……。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_021<tab>They discovered their missing comrades standing over the body of a vinegaroon─a fearsome scalekin in thrall to the dragons. But as they approached, the monster suddenly rose to its feet and sprang at the would-be rescuers, slaying several before they could ready themselves.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_021……竜の眷属ビネガロンの死体と、その前に立つ騎士の姿を。
でも、生存者を発見したと喜んで捜索隊が近づいたところ、
突如としてビネガロンが立ち上がり、襲いかかってきたらしいの。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_022<tab>The Temple Knights were all dead─the Scarecrow had propped up their corpses to lure their rescuers into a trap. After taking its toll on the rescue party, the monster fled up the slopes of Sohm Al, and naught has been seen of it since. We believe it may yet be hiding in the Churning Mists.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_022惨殺した騎兵を利用し、捜索隊を誘き寄せたってわけ。
この狡猾な眷属は、襲撃の後、霊峰の方へ逃げ去った……
おそらく今頃は、ドラヴァニア雲海でしょうね。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_030<tab>Most heretics are drawn from common stock, but there are more than a few nobles among them too. One such fellow was the husband of a lady Temple Knight─unbeknownst to her, he abused his position to steal the order's secrets and feed them to the dragons.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_030異端者は、多くが平民出身だけど、中には貴族もいるわ。
ある男性貴族が、妻である名門貴族の女当主を利用することで、
長年に渡り、神殿騎士団の情報を流していた事があってね。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_031<tab>For years the nobleman passed sensitive information to the Horde, until the day he grew weary of his double life and supped from the scaly cup, transforming himself into a monstrous scalekin. His plan was simple─to slaughter his family, feign his own death, and join with the dragons.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_031こともあろうに、この男は一通り情報収集を終えると、
「竜の血」を飲んでドラゴン族の眷属と化したの。
家族を殺して、証拠を隠滅するためにね……。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_032<tab>Thanks to the timely intervention of the order, the former parts of his plan were foiled, but the beast broke their cordon and succeeded in fleeing to Dravania. It was one of the Temple Knights who put the bounty on his head─the very lady who was once his wife.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_032幸い神殿騎士団の活躍で、最悪の事態は免れたけど、
眷属と化した男は、皇都を脱出して逃げ去ったというわ。
討伐依頼を出してきたのは、生き残った妻よ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_040<tab>Do you know the story of Saint Valeroyant? Eight centuries ago, he served as an Azure Dragoon, and won glory by driving away the great wyrm Nidhogg. This very square still bears his name, though his image has seen better days.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_040広場の名前にもなってる、聖バルロアイアンって人はね、
200年くらい前に実在した「蒼の竜騎士」なの。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_041<tab>He was an unrivaled warrior who dealt death to dragon after dragon, but there was one that always managed to slip his clutches─Agathos, feared across the land as the <var 1A 02 /var>Black Death<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_041凄腕の竜騎士だった聖バルロアイアンが、
唯一、激戦の末に取り逃してしまった竜がいる……。
それが、黒翼の魔竜と恐れられる「アガトス」よ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_042<tab>Naught has been seen of the creature since Valeroyant's passing, but in recent years, rumors have been spreading of a shadow of Agathos's size and shape appearing in the clouds above Dravania. Could this be our chance to bring Saint Valeroyant's legend to a close?
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_042近年になって、ドラヴァニアの高空を舞うアガトスの影が、
猟師によって目撃されたって、話題になってるの。
伝説に終止符を打つチャンスだとは思わない？

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_050<tab>It isn't only the dragons who have brought heretics into our midst, you know. Five hundred years ago, another heretical sect gained traction among the smallfolk of Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_050500年ほど前、ある異端の宗派が、
皇都の裏通りで流行したことがあったの。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_051<tab>The heathens adopted the customs of the Near East, bathing themselves in perfumes brewed from strange flowers and forging idols from rare metals that they used in their bizarre and unholy rites.
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_051この邪教は、近東の文化を採り入れていて、
特殊な花で作る香と、妙な金属で作った祭器を使って、
珍妙な儀式を繰り返していたというわ。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_052<tab>Naturally, the Temple Knights were quick to clamp down on the sect's activities. Its leader, a peasant who styled himself the great guru Gandarewa, fled to the next holiest place he knew─the sacred mountain of Dravania. There he supped on the blood of a dragon, and was forever changed...
target:
TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_EUSTACIA_000_052結局、神殿騎士団による取り締まりで、この邪教は壊滅。
ただし、自ら「ガンダルヴァ」と名乗っていた教祖だけは、
霊峰に逃亡したらしいわ……ドラゴン族の眷属と化してね。

source: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_TALK_ACTOR<tab>
target: TEXT_REGROC2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTT1B_00269_TALK_ACTOR<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
